page.title: 08HEALTH CARE (cont)
page.content: She visits throughout the childs first 5 yrs. The Local Authority have the responsibility of Medical and Dental checks on children in school. There are 3 centres for the elderly including Bungalow developments at Eakring and Bilsthorpe. A Mobile Unit Chiropody Service for pensioners visits Bilsthorpe every 6 wks, Eakring patients are collected by ambulance. Prescriptions are available from the Chemists in Bilsthorpe, scripts for Eakring patients are delivered to the Post Office. There is an Optician who comes part time to Bilsthorpe. Patients needing Physiotherapy are referred to the Ollerton Clinic. Bilsthorpe has a Sewerage System but Eakring has no main drainage. Most houses have sceptic tanks but the council houses have their own sewerage system.
